it.unimi.dsi.law.rank
Class PageRank.NormDeltaStoppingCriterion

java.lang.Object
  it.unimi.dsi.law.rank.PageRank.NormDeltaStoppingCriterion
All Implemented Interfaces:
PageRank.StoppingCriterion
Enclosing class:
PageRank
public static class PageRank.NormDeltaStoppingCriterion
extends Object
implements PageRank.StoppingCriterion

A stopping criterion that evaluates the norm of the difference between the last two iterates, and stops if this value is smaller than a given threshold.

Constructor Summary

          Creates an instance with given threshold.
